markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flicker](/Feats.aspx?ID=922) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Lion Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=22)

**Prerequisites**
[Lion Blade Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=917)

</column>

---

You use your movements and disguises to make yourself a flickering blur. You gain concealment until your next turn. As usual for concealment involving an obvious visual manifestation, you can’t use this concealment to Hide.
name: Flicker
